participant_1.background:
I'm constantly tripping over my own feet, but I'm determined to make it as a wedding planner.
My parents are supportive of my musical career and help me out a lot.
I do my laundry when I run out of clean clothes.
I work in a coffee shop, and I can get a little stressed out with the fast pace and the need to always be on my feet.
I am more of an introvert and would rather spend my time reading or watching Ted Talks than scrolling through social media.

participant_2.background:
I am an aspiring male model while my mother looks after my grandmother.
I want to live in a safe neighborhood with good schools, so my daughter and grandchildren can grow up happy and healthy.
I had a quiet Christmas birthday with my family and my boyfriend.
I recall spending long hours in the woods with my dog, chasing rabbits and playing hide-and-seek.
I go hiking in the mountains to clear my head and get some exercise.

content.text: Hello, my name is participant_1. What's yours?
Hi, I'm participant_2. I'm an aspiring male model.
Oh, that's cool. What made you want to become a model?
I've always been interested in fashion and modeling, and I think I have the look and the personality for it.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do well.
So, what else do you like to do besides model?
I love spending time with my family and my dog. I also like to go hiking in the mountains to clear my head and get some exercise.
That sounds really nice. I love hiking too. It's so peaceful and relaxing.
Me too. It's a great way to get away from it all.
So, what are your goals for the future?
I want to become a successful model and eventually start my own modeling agency.
That's a great goal! I'm sure you'll achieve it.
